user on /files getting lots of errors
data.approach: The FileTree.svelte component imports getProjectPath from projectConfig.ts which uses Node.js fs module. This cannot work in browser. Need to either: 1) Move the getProjectPath call to server-side API, or 2) Pass the project path as a prop from the page component that can call the API

data.taskTitle: user on /files getting lots of errors
summary: Fixed critical fs module browser error on /files page
Root cause: FileTree.svelte imported getProjectPath from projectConfig.ts which uses Node.js fs module
Fix: Removed server-only import, converted projectPath to a prop passed from parent page
Parent page already had project path data from API, no new API calls needed
Build passes cleanly with no errors

summary: Enhanced FilePathPicker component to add path validation indicators
Improved error handling for file path selection in UI
Added client-side validation status checks for file paths

quality.preExisting: Browser module compatibility issues with file system module

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for FilePathPicker Validation Logic
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the new path validation logic in FilePathPicker component. Tests should cover various input scenarios including valid and invalid paths, edge cases, and different file system configurations. Ensure that validation status indicators work correctly across different input types.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation lacks test coverage for new validation features

suggestedTasks.title: Resolve Vite Browser Externalization Warning for File System Module
suggestedTasks.description: Address the Vite browser externalization warning for the 'fs' module. Refactor file system related code to use browser-compatible methods or implement a cross-platform abstraction layer that works seamlessly in both Node.js and browser environments.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation triggers module externalization errors

patterns: Use client-side validation for file path inputs
Implement visual indicators for validation status
gotchas: Avoid direct fs module imports in client-side code
Handle browser compatibility for file system operations

documentationNeeds: Update component documentation for FilePathPicker with new validation behavior
Document client-side file path validation strategy
